dc_title_s: Americae sive novi orbis nova descriptio
dc_description_s: 1 map: hand colored; Relief shown pictorially; (In Ortel (Abraham). Theatrum orbis terrarum. fol. Antiverpiæ, apud Ægid Coppenium Diesth, 1570); Cum privilegio; Includes decorative corners and title cartouche, illustrations of fish and ships; Latin text on verso of print version. Scale approximately 1:83,500,000. At Equator (E 162°20ʹ00ʺ--W 17°40ʹ00ʺ/N 65°00ʹ00ʺ--N 65°00ʹ00ʺ).
